Hi Vivek,  
To me it's _only_ a classpath problem! As it can't find the package:
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:1: package junit.framework does 
not exist
import junit.framework.*;

I dunno how the problem is solved in win*, though it should smth like
set CLASSPATH=c:\my\beautiful\path
separator should be different from ":", maybe ";"...
FIXME dos gurus.

Regards,
Reda
